org.jchassis.termctl
Class Key

java.lang.Object
  org.jchassis.termctl.Key
Direct Known Subclasses:
ModifierKey
public class Key
extends java.lang.Object

A representation of a key on a keyboard. These are used for contructing keystrokes. Keys that represent a particular character have a 'char' value. Modifier keys, (the SHIFT key, etc.) for example, don't have a value.
